# slicr

Tiny Python CLI that prints "hello world".

## Install

You can install locally in editable mode during development:

```powershell
pip install -e .
```

Or build a source and wheel distribution:

```powershell
python -m build
```

Then install the built wheel with pip.

## Usage

After installation, run:

```powershell
slicr
```

Which prints:

```text
hello world
```
